import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Table from './Table'; const categories = [ { Category: 'Sandwiches', name: 'Toast', price: 10, }, { Category: 'Sandwiches', name: 'Hot dog', price: 15, }, ]; Salads = [ { Category: 'Sandwiches', name: 'Salads', price: 15, }, { Category: 'Salads', name: 'Chicken salad', price: 10, }, ]; const Drinks = ['Coca-cola', 'Coca-cola zero']; const AddOrder = ({ table, handleGoBack, handleCategory, selectedCategory, }) => { const [categoryClicked, isCategoryClicked] = useState(false); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); return (
Table: {table.number}
Products QTY Total
{table.order.products.map((product) => ( {product}
))} {table.order.quantities.map((quantity) => ( {quantity}
))} {table.order.prices.map((price) => ( {price} â‚¬
))}
{categoryClicked ? selectedCategory : ''}
); }; export default AddOrder;
